title: How It Works Illustrated - Issue 2, 2014
description:
How It Works Illustrated is everything you love about learning. Packed with fascinating stories about the world around us, each 132 page issue is dedicated to explaining everything readers want to know about one mind blowing topic. As well as amazing stories and features, How It Works Illustrated also offers brain-busting puzzles, challenges and quizzes to stimulate your mind and truly bring learning to life.

Earth & the Natural Wonders

Amazing facts about Earth
- Incredible info about our planet

The Sun and Moon
- How our nearest star and natural satellite effect life on Earth

Underneath Earth
- The crazy science that lies right beneath our feet

Rain and storms
- How water works and weird weather explained


Also inside...

* Why is there Life On Earth ?

* How Earth Spins Around the Sun ?

* Why is there Day & Night ?

* Why do we need the Sun ?

* Why do we need the Moon ?

* Why is it Cold in Winter and Hot In Summer ?

* How Big Is Earth ?

* Why do things fall to floor ?

* Why is the Sky blue ?

* How to make a Earthquake ?

* The Worlds biggest waves ?

* What is the biggest thing to hit earth ?

* How Much water id there on Earth ?

* How Deep is the deepest ocean ?

* What is the biggest waterfall ?

* Where does rain come from ?

* How to make a cloud ?

* What can lightning strike ?

* How Fast can a wind go ?

* Where is the hottest place on earth ?

* What's the largest desert in the World ?

* Where Does sand come from ?

* What's the world heaviest thing ?

.................And Many More.................


How It Works Illustrated - Issue 2, 2014
Book Language: English
Pages: 132
File Type: Pdf
